page.title: 18HOUSING 3 -OTFORD
page.content: Only a small part of Otford is included in the area of the survey. In this area the houses range from small late C19th terraced cottages to five year old detached houses on a small estate. In the post 1945 period most of the housing expansions has been by private developers rather than by individual in-filling or council building. Further expansion is being resisted by the Otford Society (see page16) so as to maintain the character of Otford.It is not expected that new housing will be planned in this western area of the village in the foreseeable future.
